name: EnigmOn
summary: EnigmOn is the most original brain teaser game with more than one billion players over the world. You like to solve brain-teasing riddles ? You like to rack your brain ? You like challenges ? So you'll love playing EnigmOn! Every detail is important, each sound, each picture, each reference can help you to solve the enigmas. Can you meet the challenge?! It's up to you!
